name: Lucas Chapter + Redux
description:
The officla public release of an old birthday present I had cobbled together in 2 days for my friend Triggered Legs back in 2021.

I never publicly released it since I thought there wasn't really any reason to, so now to celebrate his 20th birthday, here it is; the Fellaquest game that was never available until now.

Aside from just being a rerelease of I game I put like no effort into, to make this more worth it I've packaged with it a "Redux" version, serving as a loose sequel/remake of the original, only with the added benefit of me having 2 more years of RPG Maker experience and more than 2 days to make it.
